Package mvc.controller

Class SimpleStockMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • mvc.controller.AbstractMenus
      • mvc.controller.SimpleStockMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Menus
    class SimpleStockMenu
extends AbstractMenus
    The SimpleStockMenu support the inputs for basic stock functions like gain/loss, moving avg, crossovers.
